repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of Canadian National Railways Train Orders. [46 pieces]

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Canadian National Railways Train Orders #5150. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5135: Canadian Board of Conciliation Records 5149: Brotherhood of Railroad Trainmen Records 5166: Harrington Emerson Files 5478: AFL-CIO Railway Employees' Department Records 5478 mf: AFL-CIO Railway Employees' Department Records on Microfilm 5488 A: BRAC Chicago Files 5488 B: BRAC Records 5488 C: BRAC Additional Records 5583/1: Archives Organization File (AOF) Part 1 5583/2: Archives Organization File (AOF) Part 2 5583/3: Archives Organization File (AOF) Part 3 5583/6: Archives Organization File (AOF) Part 6 5693: Labor Editorial Files 5880: Archives Organization File V, Additional Company Documents 5956: Archives Organization File Additional records 5976 mf: Brotherhood of Sleeping Car Porters Records on Microfilm 6039: Railroad Files 6178/017: BLS Collection of Collective Bargaining Agreements (Part 17)
